df-tmd
blocks.content: Define the class of all topological monoids. A topological monoid is a monoid whose operation is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: df-tgp
blocks.content: Define the class of all topological groups. A topological group is a group whose operation and inverse function are continuous. (Contributed by FL, 18-Apr-2010.)

blocks.name: istmd
blocks.content: The predicate "is a topological monoid". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm istmd(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ctmd), w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, ctmd), w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2))), wa(wcel(c0, cin(cmnd, ctps)), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ctps)), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2))))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, cin(cmnd, ctps)), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ctps)))
  elin(c0, cmnd, ctps)
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ctmd, cin(cmnd, ctps), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)), wsbc(hs1, cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(cplusf, cv(hs0)), co(co(cv(hs1), ctx, cv(hs1)), ccn, cv(hs1)))))
  sbcied(hs1, cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), universe, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(cplusf, cv(hs0)), co(co(cv(hs1), ctx, cv(hs1)), ccn, cv(hs1))), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
  fvexd(ctopn, cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq12d(cfv(cplusf, cv(hs0)), co(co(cv(hs1), ctx, cv(hs1)), ccn, cv(hs1)), c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cplusf, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cplusf, c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)))))
  fveq2d(cplusf, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)))))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0))))
  oveq12d(co(cv(hs1), ctx, cv(hs1)), ccn, cv(hs1), co(c2, ctx, c2), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)))))
  oveq12d(cv(hs1), ctx, cv(hs1), c2, c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)))))
  sylan9eqr(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(ctopn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ctopn)
  df-tmd(hs0, hs1)
  df-3an(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cmnd, ctps))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm istmd(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMnd ↔(c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c0 ∈ TopSp ∧ c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2)))
  ⊣ c1 =(+f ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(c0 ∈ TopMnd, (c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c0 ∈ TopSp ∧ c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2)), (c0 ∈(Mnd ⋂ TopSp)∧ c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2)), ((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c0 ∈ TopSp)∧ c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2)))
  anbi1i(c0 ∈(Mnd ⋂ TopSp), c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2), (c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c0 ∈ TopSp))
  elin(c0, cmnd, ctps)
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ctmd, (Mnd ⋂ TopSp), c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2), [(TopOpen ` hs0)/ hs1](+f ` hs0)∈((hs1[tX]hs1)[Cn]hs1))
  sbcied(hs1, (TopOpen ` hs0), universe, hs0 = c0, (+f ` hs0)∈((hs1[tX]hs1)[Cn]hs1), c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
  fvexd(ctopn, hs0, hs0 = c0)
  eleq12d((+f ` hs0), ((hs1[tX]hs1)[Cn]hs1), c1, ((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0)))
  syl6eqr((+f ` hs0), c1, (+f ` c0), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0)))
  fveq2d(cplusf, hs0, c0, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0)))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0))
  oveq12d((hs1[tX]hs1), ccn, hs1, (c2[tX]c2), c2, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0)))
  oveq12d(hs1, ctx, hs1, c2, c2, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0)))
  sylan9eqr(hs1, c2, (TopOpen ` hs0), hs0 = c0, hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0))
  id(hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0))
  syl6eqr((TopOpen ` hs0), c2, (TopOpen ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ctopn)
  df-tmd(hs0, hs1)
  df-3an(c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ TopSp, c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Mnd ⋂ TopSp))
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
  diff.hs1.c((TopOpen ` hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = c0)
  diff.hs1.w(c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

blocks.name: tmdmnd

blocks.name: tmdtps

blocks.name: istgp
blocks.content: The predicate "is a topological group". Definition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. III.1. (Contributed by FL, 18-Apr-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm istgp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ctgp), w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c2))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cminusg, c0))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, ctgp), w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c2))), wa(wcel(c0, cin(cgrp, ctmd)), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ctmd)), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c2))))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, cin(cgrp, ctmd)), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ctmd)))
  elin(c0, cgrp, ctmd)
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ctgp, cin(cgrp, ctmd), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c2)), wsbc(hs1, cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(cminusg, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), ccn, cv(hs1)))))
  sbcied(hs1, cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), universe, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(cminusg, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), ccn, cv(hs1))), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  fvexd(ctopn, cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq12d(cfv(cminusg, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), ccn, cv(hs1)), c1, co(c2, ccn, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cminusg, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cminusg, c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)))))
  fveq2d(cminusg, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)))))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0))))
  oveq12d(cv(hs1), ccn, cv(hs1), c2, c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)))))
  sylan9eqr(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(ctopn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ctopn)
  df-tgp(hs0, hs1)
  df-3an(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cgrp, ctmd))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm istgp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ TopGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ∈ TopMnd ∧ c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2)))
  ⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(invg ` c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(c0 ∈ TopGrp, (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ∈ TopMnd ∧ c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2)), (c0 ∈(Grp ⋂ TopMnd)∧ c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2)), ((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ∈ TopMnd)∧ c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2)))
  anbi1i(c0 ∈(Grp ⋂ TopMnd), c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2), (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ∈ TopMnd))
  elin(c0, cgrp, ctmd)
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ctgp, (Grp ⋂ TopMnd), c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2), [(TopOpen ` hs0)/ hs1](invg ` hs0)∈(hs1[Cn]hs1))
  sbcied(hs1, (TopOpen ` hs0), universe, hs0 = c0, (invg ` hs0)∈(hs1[Cn]hs1), c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2))
  fvexd(ctopn, hs0, hs0 = c0)
  eleq12d((invg ` hs0), (hs1[Cn]hs1), c1, (c2[Cn]c2), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0)))
  syl6eqr((invg ` hs0), c1, (invg ` c0), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0)))
  fveq2d(cminusg, hs0, c0, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0)))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0))
  oveq12d(hs1, ccn, hs1, c2, c2, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0)))
  sylan9eqr(hs1, c2, (TopOpen ` hs0), hs0 = c0, hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0))
  id(hs1 =(TopOpen ` hs0))
  syl6eqr((TopOpen ` hs0), c2, (TopOpen ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ctopn)
  df-tgp(hs0, hs1)
  df-3an(c0 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ TopMnd, c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Grp ⋂ TopMnd))
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2))
  diff.hs1.c((TopOpen ` hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = c0)
  diff.hs1.w(c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

blocks.name: tmdcn
blocks.content: In a topological monoid, the operation ` F ` representing the functionalization of the operator slot ` +g ` is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: tgpcn
blocks.content: In a topological group, the operation ` F ` representing the functionalization of the operator slot ` +g ` is continuous. (Contributed by FL, 21-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: tgpinv
blocks.content: In a topological group, the inverse function is continuous. (Contributed by FL, 21-Jun-2010.) (Revised by FL, 27-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: grpinvhmeo
blocks.content: The inverse function in a topological group is a homeomorphism from the group to itself. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpinvhmeo(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, co(c2, chmeo, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cminusg, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, co(c2, chmeo, c2)), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c1), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  eqeltrd(ccnv(c1), co(c2, ccn, c2), c1, wcel(c0, ctgp))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctgp), wceq(ccnv(c1), c1), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  tgpgrp(c0)
  grpinvcnv(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  tgpinv(c0, c1, c2)
  ishmeo(c1, c2, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpinvhmeo(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c1 ∈(c2[Homeo]c2))
  ⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(invg ` c0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ∈ TopGrp, c1 ∈(c2[Homeo]c2), c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2), `' c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c2))
  eqeltrd(`' c1, (c2[Cn]c2), c1, c0 ∈ TopGrp)
  syl(c0 ∈ TopGrp, `' c1 = c1, c0 ∈ Grp)
  tgpgrp(c0)
  grpinvcnv(c0, c1, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  tgpinv(c0, c1, c2)
  ishmeo(c1, c2, c2)
}

blocks.name: cnmpt1plusg
blocks.content: Continuity of the group sum; analogue of ~ cnmpt12f which cannot be used directly because ` +g ` is not a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnmpt1plusg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c4, ccn, c5)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ctopn, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, ctmd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c4, ccn, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, ccn, c5)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c4, ccn, c5), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cfv(cplusf, c6), c3)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(c1, cfv(cplusf, c6), c3), co(c1, c2, c3), w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cplusf, c6), c3), co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c6)), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  fvmptelrn(s0, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c6), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, cfv(cbs, c6)), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c0)), wcel(c5, cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c6))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c4, ccn, c5)))
  cnf2(c4, c0, c5, cfv(cbs, c6), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  fvmptelrn(s0, c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c6), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0, cfv(cbs, c6)), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c0)), wcel(c5, cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c6))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, ccn, c5)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c6))), wcel(c6, ctmd))
  tmdtopon(c6, c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  cnf2(c4, c0, c5, cfv(cbs, c6), cmpt(s0, c0, c3))
  plusfval(c1, cfv(cbs, c6), c3, cfv(cplusf, c6), c2, c6)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c6))
  cnmpt12f(s0, c0, c1, cfv(cplusf, c6), c3, c4, c5, c5, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cplusf, c6), co(co(c5, ctx, c5), ccn, c5)), wcel(c6, ctmd))
  tmdcn(c6, cfv(cplusf, c6), c5)
  eqid(cfv(cplusf, c6))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c6)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cplusf, c6)
  diff.cplusf.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnmpt1plusg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[c2]c3))∈(c4[Cn]c5))
  ⊣ c5 =(TopOpen ` c6)
  ⊣ c2 =(+ ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ TopMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈(TopOn ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c4[Cn]c5))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c3)∈(c4[Cn]c5))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[c2]c3)), (c4[Cn]c5), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[(+f ` c6)]c3)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, (c1[(+f ` c6)]c3), (c1[c2]c3), w0)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (c1[(+f ` c6)]c3)=(c1[c2]c3), c1 ∈(Base ` c6), c3 ∈(Base ` c6))
  fvmptelrn(s0, c0, c1, (Base ` c6), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1): c0 →(Base ` c6)), c4 ∈(TopOn ` c0), c5 ∈(TopOn `(Base ` c6)), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c4[Cn]c5))
  cnf2(c4, c0, c5, (Base ` c6), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  fvmptelrn(s0, c0, c3, (Base ` c6), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c3): c0 →(Base ` c6)), c4 ∈(TopOn ` c0), c5 ∈(TopOn `(Base ` c6)), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c3)∈(c4[Cn]c5))
  syl(w0, c5 ∈(TopOn `(Base ` c6)), c6 ∈ TopMnd)
  tmdtopon(c6, c5, (Base ` c6))
  cnf2(c4, c0, c5, (Base ` c6), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c3))
  plusfval(c1, (Base ` c6), c3, (+f ` c6), c2, c6)
  eqid((Base ` c6))
  cnmpt12f(s0, c0, c1, (+f ` c6), c3, c4, c5, c5, c5, w0)

  biimpa(wcel(cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cxp(c4, c4)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cplusf, c0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), c1), wcel(co(cv(s2), c6, cv(s3)), c1))
  eleq1d(cfv(cfv(cplusf, c0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), c1, co(cv(s2), c6, cv(s3)), wcel(cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cxp(c4, c4)))
  sylbi(wcel(cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cxp(c4, c4)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cplusf, c0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), co(cv(s2), c6, cv(s3))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c4), wcel(cv(s3), c4)))

blocks.name: tgpsubcn
blocks.content: In a topological group, the "subtraction" (or "division") is continuous. Axiom GT' of [BourbakiTop1] p. III.1. (Contributed by FL, 21-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgpsubcn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csg, c0))
} = {
  syl5eqel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, ctgp))
  grpsubfval(hs0, hs1, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cminusg, c0), c0)
  cnmpt2plusg(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c2, c2, c2, c0, wcel(c0, ctgp))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  tgptmd(c0)
  cnmpt1st(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c2, c2, wcel(c0, ctgp))
  cnmpt21f(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(hs1), c2, c2, c2, c2, wcel(c0, ctgp))
  cnmpt2nd(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c2, c2, wcel(c0, ctgp))
  tgptopon(c0, c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  tgpinv(c0, cfv(cminusg, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cminusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cminusg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ctgp))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, ctgp))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgpsubcn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
  ⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(-g ` c0)
} = {
  syl5eqel(c1, ((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2), (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c0)↦(hs0[(+ ` c0)]((invg ` c0)` hs1))), c0 ∈ TopGrp)
  grpsubfval(hs0, hs1, c1, (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0), (invg ` c0), c0)
  cnmpt2plusg(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c0), hs0, (+ ` c0), ((invg ` c0)` hs1), c2, c2, c2, c0, c0 ∈ TopGrp)
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  tgptmd(c0)
  cnmpt1st(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c0), c2, c2, c0 ∈ TopGrp)
  cnmpt21f(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c0), (invg ` c0), hs1, c2, c2, c2, c2, c0 ∈ TopGrp)
  cnmpt2nd(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c0), c2, c2, c0 ∈ TopGrp)
  tgptopon(c0, c2, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  tgpinv(c0, (invg ` c0), c2)
  eqid((invg ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((invg ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((invg ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ TopGrp)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ TopGrp)
}

blocks.name: istgp2
blocks.content: A group with a topology is a topological group iff the subtraction operation is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  grpsubinv(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(cminusg, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c0, w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))))

  simp2(w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simp3(w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))

blocks.name: tmdmulg
blocks.content: In a topological monoid, the n-times group multiple function is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2015.)

  mndidcl(c0, cfv(c0g, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqeltrd(cmpt(s0, c2, co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c3, cv(s0))), co(c4, ccn, c4), cmpt(hs2, c2, co(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0))), co(c4, ccn, c4))))

  oveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs2), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c3)
  mpteq2dva(hs2, c2, co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c3, cv(hs2)), co(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0))), co(c4, ccn, c4))))

  syl3an1(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2), wceq(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c3, cv(hs2)), co(co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2))), wcel(c0, cmnd))

  cnmpt1plusg(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2), c4, c4, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0))), co(c4, ccn, c4))))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  syl5eqelr(cmpt(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2))), co(c4, ccn, c4), cmpt(s0, c2, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0))), co(c4, ccn, c4))))
  cbvmptv(s0, hs2, c2, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0)), co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs2), cv(hs1), c3)
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0))), co(c4, ccn, c4)))
  cnmptid(hs2, c2, c4, wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0))), co(c4, ccn, c4))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0))), co(c4, ccn, c4))), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wcel(c0, ctmd))
  simpll(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0))), co(c4, ccn, c4)))
  tmdtopon(c0, c4, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ctmd))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, co(c1, c3, cv(s0))), co(c4, ccn, c4)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0g, c0)), co(c4, ccn, c4)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0))), co(c4, ccn, c4)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c3, cv(s0))), co(c4, ccn, c4)))

thm tmdmulg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)

  oveq1(hs0, nat0, c3, s0)
  mulg0(s0, c2, c3, (0 ` c0), c0)
  eleq1d((s0 ∈ c2 ↦(hs0[c3]s0)), (c4[Cn]c4), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(hs1[c3]s0)), hs0 = hs1)

  mpteq2dv(s0, c2, (hs0[c3]s0), (c1[c3]s0), hs0 = c1)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, c3, s0)
  cnmptc(s0, c2, (0 ` c0), c4, c4, c2, c0 ∈ TopMnd)
  syl(c0 ∈ TopMnd, (0 ` c0)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Mnd)
  mndidcl(c0, (0 ` c0), c2)
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  eqeltrd((s0 ∈ c2 ↦((hs1[+]1)[c3]s0)), (c4[Cn]c4), (hs2 ∈ c2 ↦((hs1[c3]hs2)[(+ ` c0)]hs2)), ((c0 ∈ TopMnd ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ0)∧(s0 ∈ c2 ↦(hs1[c3]s0))∈(c4[Cn]c4)))
  syl5eq((s0 ∈ c2 ↦((hs1[+]1)[c3]s0)), (hs2 ∈ c2 ↦((hs1[c3]hs2)[(+ ` c0)]hs2)), (hs2 ∈ c2 ↦((hs1[+]1)[c3]hs2)), ((c0 ∈ TopMnd ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ0)∧(s0 ∈ c2 ↦(hs1[c3]s0))∈(c4[Cn]c4)))
  cbvmptv(s0, hs2, c2, ((hs1[+]1)[c3]s0), ((hs1[+]1)[c3]hs2))
  oveq2(s0, hs2, (hs1[+]1), c3)
  mpteq2dva(hs2, c2, ((hs1[+]1)[c3]hs2), ((hs1[c3]hs2)[(+ ` c0)]hs2), ((c0 ∈ TopMnd ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ0)∧(s0 ∈ c2 ↦(hs1[c3]s0))∈(c4[Cn]c4)))

  syl(((c0 ∈ TopMnd ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ0)∧(s0 ∈ c2 ↦(hs1[c3]s0))∈(c4[Cn]c4)), c4 ∈(TopOn ` c2), c0 ∈ TopMnd)
  simpll(c0 ∈ TopMnd, hs1 ∈ ℕ0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(hs1[c3]s0))∈(c4[Cn]c4))
  tmdtopon(c0, c4, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  diff.hs0.w((s0 ∈ c2 ↦(0 ` c0))∈(c4[Cn]c4))

  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ TopMnd)
  diff.hs1.w((s0 ∈ c2 ↦(hs0[c3]s0))∈(c4[Cn]c4))

blocks.name: tgpmulg
blocks.content: In a topological group, the n-times group multiple function is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2015.)

thm tgpmulg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  mulgnegnn(cneg(c1), cv(s0), c2, c3, cfv(cminusg, c0), c0)
  cnmpt11f(s0, c2, cfv(cminusg, c0), co(cneg(c1), c3, cv(s0)), c4, c4, c4, wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cneg(c1), cn)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(cneg(c1), cn), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  tgptopon(c0, c4, c2)
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cneg(c1), cn), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, co(cneg(c1), c3, cv(s0))), co(c4, ccn, c4)), wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(cneg(c1), cn0))

  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  mpjaodan((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[c3]s0))∈(c4[Cn]c4), c1 ∈ ℕ0, (c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ -u(c1)∈ ℕ))

  eqeltrd((s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[c3]s0)), (c4[Cn]c4), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦((invg ` c0)`(-u(c1)[c3]s0))), ((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)∧ -u(c1)∈ ℕ))
  mpteq2dva(s0, c2, (c1[c3]s0), ((invg ` c0)`(-u(c1)[c3]s0)), ((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)∧ -u(c1)∈ ℕ))

  oveq1d(-u(-u(c1)), c3, s0, c1, (((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)∧ -u(c1)∈ ℕ)∧ s0 ∈ c2))

  mulgnegnn(-u(c1), s0, c2, c3, (invg ` c0), c0)
  cnmpt11f(s0, c2, (invg ` c0), (-u(c1)[c3]s0), c4, c4, c4, ((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)∧ -u(c1)∈ ℕ))

  tgptopon(c0, c4, c2)
  syl2an((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), -u(c1)∈ ℕ, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(-u(c1)[c3]s0))∈(c4[Cn]c4), c0 ∈ TopMnd, -u(c1)∈ ℕ0)

blocks.name: tgpmulg2
blocks.content: In a topological monoid, the group multiple function is jointly continuous (although this is not saying much as one of the factors is discrete). Use ~ zdis to write the left topology as a subset of the complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgpmulg2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, co(co(cpw(cz), ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmg, c0))
} = {
  txdis1cn(hs0, hs1, c1, cz, c2, c2, universe, cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(c0, ctgp))
  a1i(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(cz, universe))
  zex()
  syl(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  tgptopon(c0, c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  topontop(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, ctgp), wfn(c1, cxp(cz, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  mulgfn(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  tgpmulg(hs1, c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), c1, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ctgp))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
}

thm tgpmulg2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

blocks.name: tmdgsum
blocks.content: In a topological monoid, the group sum operation is a continuous function from the function space to the base topology. This theorem is not true when ` A ` is infinite, because in this case for any basic open set of the domain one of the factors will be the whole space, so by varying the value of the functions to sum at this index, one can achieve any desired sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 24-Jul-2019.)

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

  eleq12d(cmpt(s0, co(c2, cmap, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cgsu, cv(s0))), co(cfv(cpt, cxp(cv(hs0), csn(c3))), ccn, c3), cmpt(s0, co(c2, cmap, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cgsu, cv(s0))), co(cfv(cpt, cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c3))), ccn, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

  fveq2d(cpt, cxp(cv(hs0), csn(c3)), cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

blocks.name: tmdgsum2
blocks.content: For any neighborhood ` U ` of ` n X ` , there is a neighborhood ` u ` of ` X ` such that any sum of ` n ` elements in ` u ` sums to an element of ` U ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tmdgsum2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wral(s1, co(cv(s0), cmap, c2), wcel(co(c3, cgsu, cv(s1)), c4)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ctopn, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cmg, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ctmd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(co(cfv(chash, c2), c6, c1), c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {

blocks.name: oppgtmd
blocks.content: The opposite of a topological monoid is a topological monoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oppgtmd(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, ctmd))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c0))
} = {
  syl3anbrc(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, ctmd), wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c1, ctps), wcel(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), co(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), ctx, cfv(ctopn, c0)), ccn, cfv(ctopn, c0))))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  tmdmnd(c0)
  oppgmnd(c0, c1)
  sylibr(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, ctps), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  istps(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  cnmpt2plusg(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0), cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c0), c0, wcel(c0, ctmd))
  id(wcel(c0, ctmd))
  cnmpt2nd(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c0), wcel(c0, ctmd))
  cnmpt1st(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c0), wcel(c0, ctmd))
  tmdtopon(c0, cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  istmd(c1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), cfv(ctopn, c0))
  eqtr2i(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), cfv(cplusf, c1), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))))
  plusffval(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusf, c1), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1), c1)
  oppgbas(cfv(cbs, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusf, c1))
  mpoeq123i(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  oppgplus(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c0, c1)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  oppgtopn(cfv(ctopn, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ctopn, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(ctopn, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ctmd))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, ctmd))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMnd → c1 ∈ TopMnd)
  ⊣ c1 =(oppG ` c0)
} = {
  syl3anbrc(c0 ∈ TopMnd, c1 ∈ TopMnd, c1 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ TopSp, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c0)↦(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))∈(((TopOpen ` c0)[tX](TopOpen ` c0))[Cn](TopOpen ` c0)))

  tmdmnd(c0)
  oppgmnd(c0, c1)
  sylibr(c0 ∈ TopMnd, c1 ∈ TopSp, (TopOpen ` c0)∈(TopOn `(Base ` c0)))
  istps(c1, (TopOpen ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  cnmpt2plusg(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c0), hs1, (+ ` c0), hs0, (TopOpen ` c0), (TopOpen ` c0), (TopOpen ` c0), c0, c0 ∈ TopMnd)
  id(c0 ∈ TopMnd)
  cnmpt2nd(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c0), (TopOpen ` c0), (TopOpen ` c0), c0 ∈ TopMnd)
  cnmpt1st(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c0), (TopOpen ` c0), (TopOpen ` c0), c0 ∈ TopMnd)
  tmdtopon(c0, (TopOpen ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  istmd(c1, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c0)↦(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), (TopOpen ` c0))
  eqtr2i((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c0)↦(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), (+f ` c1), (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c0)↦(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)))
  plusffval(hs0, hs1, (+f ` c1), (Base ` c0), (+ ` c1), c1)
  oppgbas((Base ` c0), c1, c0)
  eqid((+f ` c1))
  mpoeq123i(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c0), (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1), (Base ` c0), (Base ` c0), (hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  oppgplus(hs0, (+ ` c1), hs1, (+ ` c0), c0, c1)
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c1))
  oppgtopn((TopOpen ` c0), c1, c0)
  eqid((TopOpen ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((TopOpen ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((TopOpen ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ TopMnd)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ TopMnd)

  diff.hs1.c((+ ` c1))

blocks.name: oppgtgp
blocks.content: The opposite of a topological group is a topological group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Sep-2015.)

thm oppgtgp(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, ctgp))

  oppggrp(c0, c1)

  tgptmd(c0)
  oppgtmd(c0, c1)
  eqeltrrd(cfv(cminusg, c1), co(cfv(ctopn, c0), ccn, cfv(ctopn, c0)), cfv(cminusg, c0), wcel(c0, ctgp))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctgp), wceq(cfv(cminusg, c0), cfv(cminusg, c1)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  tgpgrp(c0)

  tgpinv(c0, cfv(cminusg, c0), cfv(ctopn, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c0))
  istgp(c1, cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(ctopn, c0))
  oppgtopn(cfv(ctopn, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c1))
}

blocks.content: Any group equipped with the discrete topology is a topological group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm distgp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2))), wcel(c0, ctgp))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
} = {
  syl3anbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2))), wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(cfv(csg, c0), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c1)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2))), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  istps(c0, c1, c2)
  eleqtrrd(cfv(csg, c0), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c1), co(c2, cmap, cxp(c2, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2))), wcel(cfv(csg, c0), co(c2, cmap, cxp(c2, c2))), wf(cfv(csg, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2)), wf(cfv(csg, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  grpsubf(c0, cfv(csg, c0), c2)
  elmap(cfv(csg, c0), c2, cxp(c2, c2))
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c1), co(c2, cmap, cxp(c2, c2)), co(cpw(cxp(c2, c2)), ccn, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2))))
  oveq1d(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c1, cpw(cxp(c2, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2))))
  syl6eq(co(c1, ctx, c1), cpw(cxp(c2, c2)), co(cpw(c2), ctx, cpw(c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2))))
  oveq12d(c1, ctx, c1, cpw(c2), cpw(c2), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2))))
  mp2an(wceq(co(cpw(c2), ctx, cpw(c2)), cpw(cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  txdis(c2, universe, c2, universe)
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2))), wceq(co(cpw(cxp(c2, c2)), ccn, c1), co(c2, cmap, cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(cxp(c2, c2), universe), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  xpex(c2, c2)
  syl6eqel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2), cpw(c2), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpw(c2)))
  ax-mp(wcel(cpw(c2), cfv(ctopon, c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c0)
  distopon(c2, universe)
  cndis(cxp(c2, c2), universe, c1, c2)
  istgp2(c0, cfv(csg, c0), c1)
  eqid(cfv(csg, c0))
}

thm distgp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

blocks.origin:
thm indistgp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpr(emptycls, c2))), wcel(c0, ctgp))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))

} = {
  syl3anbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpr(emptycls, c2))), wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(cfv(csg, c0), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c1)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpr(emptycls, c2)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpr(emptycls, c2))), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  istps(c0, c1, c2)
  eleqtrrd(cfv(csg, c0), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c1), co(c2, cmap, cxp(c2, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpr(emptycls, c2))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpr(emptycls, c2))), wcel(cfv(csg, c0), co(c2, cmap, cxp(c2, c2))), wf(cfv(csg, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c1, cpr(emptycls, c2)), wf(cfv(csg, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  grpsubf(c0, cfv(csg, c0), c2)

thm indistgp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 = { ∅, c2 })→ c0 ∈ TopGrp)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)
} = {
  syl3anbrc((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 = { ∅, c2 }), c0 ∈ TopGrp, c0 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈ TopSp, (-g ` c0)∈((c1[tX]c1)[Cn]c1))
  simpl(c0 ∈ Grp, c1 = { ∅, c2 })
  sylibr((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 = { ∅, c2 }), c0 ∈ TopSp, c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))
  istps(c0, c1, c2)
  eleqtrrd((-g ` c0), ((c1[tX]c1)[Cn]c1), (c2[↦](c2 × c2)), (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 = { ∅, c2 }))
  sylibr((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 = { ∅, c2 }), (-g ` c0)∈(c2[↦](c2 × c2)), ((-g ` c0):(c2 × c2)→ c2))
  adantr(c0 ∈ Grp, c1 = { ∅, c2 }, ((-g ` c0):(c2 × c2)→ c2))
  grpsubf(c0, (-g ` c0), c2)
  elmap((-g ` c0), c2, (c2 × c2))
  xpex(c2, c2)
  eqtrd(((c1[tX]c1)[Cn]c1), (c2[↦](c2 × c2)), ((c1[tX]c1)[Cn]{ ∅, c2 }), (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 = { ∅, c2 }))
  oveq2d((c1[tX]c1), ccn, c1, { ∅, c2 }, (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 = { ∅, c2 }))
  sylancl((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 = { ∅, c2 }), ((c1[tX]c1)[Cn]{ ∅, c2 })=(c2[↦](c2 × c2)), (c1[tX]c1)∈(TopOn `(c2 × c2)), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 = { ∅, c2 }), (c1[tX]c1)∈(TopOn `(c2 × c2)), c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2), c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))
  syl6eqel(c1, (TopOn ` c2), { ∅, c2 }, (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 = { ∅, c2 }))
  simpr(c0 ∈ Grp, c1 = { ∅, c2 })
  ax-mp({ ∅, c2 } ∈(TopOn ` c2), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  indistopon(c2, universe)
  txtopon(c1, c2, c1, c2)
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c0)
  cnindis((c1[tX]c1), (c2 × c2), c2, universe)
  istgp2(c0, (-g ` c0), c1)
  eqid((-g ` c0))
}

blocks.name: tmdlactcn
blocks.content: The left group action of element ` A ` in a topological monoid ` G ` is a continuous function. (Contributed by FL, 18-Mar-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tmdlactcn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c4, ccn, c4)))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c1, c5, cv(s0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctopn, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c4, ccn, c4))), diffsc(s0, c5))
  syl5eqel(c3, co(c4, ccn, c4), cmpt(s0, c2, co(c1, c5, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, c2)))
  cnmpt1plusg(s0, c2, c1, c5, cv(s0), c4, c4, c0, wa(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, c2))
  cnmptc(s0, c2, c1, c4, c4, c2, wa(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, c2))
  cnmptid(s0, c2, c4, wa(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  tmdtopon(c0, c4, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctmd)
  diff.ctmd.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
}

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ TopMnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈(c4[Cn]c4))

  a1ii(((c0 ∈ TopMnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈(c4[Cn]c4)), d(s0, c5))

  simpr(c0 ∈ TopMnd, c1 ∈ c2)

  adantr(c0 ∈ TopMnd, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈(TopOn ` c2))

blocks.name: subgntr
blocks.content: A subgroup of a topological group with nonempty interior is open. Alternatively, dual to ~ clssubg , the interior of a subgroup is either a subgroup, or empty. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: cldsubg
blocks.content: A subgroup of finite index is closed iff it is open. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: tgpconncompeqg
blocks.content: The connected component containing ` A ` is the left coset of the identity component containing ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: tgpconncomp
blocks.content: The identity component, the connected component containing the identity element, is a closed ( ~ conncompcld ) normal subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Sep-2015.)

blocks.content: The coset of the closure of the identity is the closure of a point. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)

  syl5eqss(c6, c2, cfv(cfv(ccl, c4), csn(c5)), wa(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, c2)))

  simpr(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, c2))

  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c4), cima(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), csn(c5))), cima(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), cfv(cfv(ccl, c4), csn(c5)))), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), co(c4, chmeo, c4)), wss(csn(c5), cuni(c4)))
  tgplacthmeo(hs0, c0, c1, c2, cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))))
  sseqtrd(csn(c5), cuni(c4), c2, wa(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(c2, cuni(c4)), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  tgptopon(c0, c4, c2)
  toponuni(c4, c2)
  hmeocls(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), c4, c4, csn(c5), cuni(c4))
  eqid(cuni(c4))
  fveq2d(cfv(ccl, c4), cima(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), csn(c5)), csn(c1), wa(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqtrd(cima(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), csn(c5)), csn(c1), crn(cmpt(hs0, csn(c5), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, c2)))

  adantr(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  grpidcl(c0, c5, c2)
  3eqtr4g(crn(cmpt(hs0, csn(c5), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)))), csn(c1), cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, csn(c5), wceq(cv(hs1), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))))), cab(hs1, wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  abbidv(hs1, wa(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(hs0, csn(c5), wceq(cv(hs1), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))

  rexsn(hs0, c5, wceq(cv(hs1), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs1), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), c5)))
  fvexi(c5, c0g, c0)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs1), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))

  eqid(cmpt(hs0, csn(c5), co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))))
  df-sn(hs1, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)

thm snclseqg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→[c1]c3 =((cls ` c4)` { c1 }))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(TopOpen ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(c0[~QG]c6)
  ⊣ c6 =((cls ` c4)` { c5 })
} = {
  eqtrd([c1]c3, ((cls ` c4)` { c1 }), ((cls ` c4)`((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))" { c5 })), (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  3eqtr4a([c1]c3, ((cls ` c4)`((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))" { c5 })), ((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))" c6), ((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))"((cls ` c4)` { c5 })), (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  imaeq2i((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), c6, ((cls ` c4)` { c5 }))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), [c1]c3 =((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))" c6), c0 ∈ Grp, c6 ⊆ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  syl5eqss(c6, c2, ((cls ` c4)` { c5 }), (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  sseqtr4d(((cls ` c4)` { c5 }), c2, ⋃ c4, (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), ((cls ` c4)` { c5 })⊆ ⋃ c4, c4 ∈ Top, { c5 } ⊆ ⋃ c4)
  syl((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c4 ∈ Top, c4 ∈(TopOn ` c2))
  topontop(c4, c2)
  clsss3(c4, { c5 }, ⋃ c4)
  simpr(c0 ∈ TopGrp, c1 ∈ c2)
  eqglact(hs0, c0, c6, c2, c1, c3, (+ ` c0))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), ((cls ` c4)`((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))" { c5 }))=((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))"((cls ` c4)` { c5 })), (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))∈(c4[Homeo]c4), { c5 } ⊆ ⋃ c4)
  tgplacthmeo(hs0, c0, c1, c2, (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), c4, (+ ` c0))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)))
  sseqtrd({ c5 }, ⋃ c4, c2, (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  syl((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c2 = ⋃ c4, c4 ∈(TopOn ` c2))
  adantr(c0 ∈ TopGrp, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈(TopOn ` c2))
  tgptopon(c0, c4, c2)
  toponuni(c4, c2)
  hmeocls((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), c4, c4, { c5 }, ⋃ c4)
  eqid(⋃ c4)
  fveq2d((cls ` c4), ((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))" { c5 }), { c1 }, (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  eqtrd(((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))" { c5 }), { c1 }, ran((hs0 ∈ { c5 } ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))), (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  syl5eq(((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))" { c5 }), ran((hs0 ∈ { c5 } ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))), ran(((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))|` { c5 })), (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  df-ima((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), { c5 })
  rneqd(((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))|` { c5 }), (hs0 ∈ { c5 } ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  resmptd(hs0, c2, (c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0), { c5 }, (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  snssd(c5, c2, (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  syl((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c5 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp)
  adantr(c0 ∈ TopGrp, c1 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ Grp)
  grpidcl(c0, c5, c2)
  3eqtr4g(ran((hs0 ∈ { c5 } ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))), { c1 }, { hs1 | ∃(hs0 ∈ { c5 }, hs1 =(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))}, { hs1 | hs1 = c1 }, (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  abbidv(hs1, (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), ∃(hs0 ∈ { c5 }, hs1 =(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), hs1 = c1)
  syl5bb((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), ∃(hs0 ∈ { c5 }, hs1 =(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), hs1 = c1, hs1 =(c1[(+ ` c0)]c5))
  rexsn(hs0, c5, hs1 =(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0), hs1 =(c1[(+ ` c0)]c5))
  fvexi(c5, c0g, c0)
  eqeq2d(hs1, (c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0), (c1[(+ ` c0)]c5), hs0 = c5)
  oveq2(hs0, c5, c1, (+ ` c0))
  eqeq2d(hs1, (c1[(+ ` c0)]c5), c1, (c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  sylan(c0 ∈ TopGrp, c1 ∈ c2, (c1[(+ ` c0)]c5)= c1, c0 ∈ Grp)
  tgpgrp(c0)
  grprid(c0, c1, c2, (+ ` c0), c5)
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  rnmpt(hs1, hs0, (hs0 ∈ { c5 } ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)), { c5 }, (c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ { c5 } ↦(c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)))
  df-sn(hs1, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c({ c5 })
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 =(c1[(+ ` c0)]c5))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c({ c5 })
  diff.hs1.c((c1[(+ ` c0)]hs0))

}

blocks.name: tgphaus
blocks.content: A topological group is Hausdorff iff the identity subgroup is closed. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgphaus(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wb(wcel(c1, cha), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(ccld, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
} = {
  impbid(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(ccld, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctgp), wi(wcel(c1, cha), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(ccld, c1))), wcel(c2, cuni(c1)))
  eleqtrd(c2, cuni(c1), cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(c0, ctgp))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  grpidcl(c0, c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  expcom(wcel(c2, cuni(c1)), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(ccld, c1)))
  sncld(c1, c2, cuni(c1))
  sylibrd(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(cres(cid, cuni(c1)), cfv(ccld, co(c1, ctx, c1))))
  sylibd(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cres(cid, cuni(c1)), cfv(ccld, co(c1, ctx, c1))), wcel(cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), cfv(ccld, co(c1, ctx, c1))))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctgp), wi(wcel(csn(c2), cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), cfv(ccld, co(c1, ctx, c1)))), wcel(cfv(csg, c0), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c1)))
  tgpsubcn(c0, cfv(csg, c0), c1)
  ex(wcel(cfv(csg, c0), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c1)), wcel(csn(c2), cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), cfv(ccld, co(c1, ctx, c1))))
  cnclima(cfv(csg, c0), co(c1, ctx, c1), c1, csn(c2))
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), cfv(ccld, co(c1, ctx, c1)), cres(cid, cuni(c1)), wcel(c0, ctgp))
  3eqtrd(cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), cres(cid, cuni(c1)), copab(hs0, hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), cv(hs1))), cres(cid, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, ctgp))
  sylib(wcel(c0, ctgp), wceq(cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), copab(hs0, hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), cv(hs1)))), wrel(cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2))))
  mpisyl(wcel(c0, ctgp), wrel(cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2))), wss(cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wrel(cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  fssdm(cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(c0, ctgp))
  cnvimass(cfv(csg, c0), csn(c2))
  relxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  relss(cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  dfrel4v(hs0, hs1, cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)))
  syl6eq(copab(hs0, hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), cv(hs1))), cres(cid, cfv(cbs, c0)), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, ctgp))
  opabbidv(hs0, hs1, wcel(c0, ctgp), wbr(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, ctgp), wbr(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2)), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(cfv(cfv(csg, c0), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), csn(c2))))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctgp), wb(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cima(ccnv(cfv(csg, c0)), csn(c2))), wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(cfv(cfv(csg, c0), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), csn(c2)))), wfn(cfv(csg, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  ffnd(cfv(csg, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(c0, ctgp))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctgp), wf(cfv(csg, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, cgrp))

blocks.name: qustgpopn
blocks.content: A quotient map in a topological group is an open map. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: qustgp
blocks.content: The quotient of a topological group is a topological group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm qustgp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c0))), wcel(c2, ctgp))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, cqus, co(c0, cqg, c1)))
} = {
  qustgplem(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c2), cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), cec(cv(hs0), co(c0, cqg, c1))), cmpo(hs1, hs2, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cec(co(cv(hs1), cfv(csg, c0), cv(hs2)), co(c0, cqg, c1))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))

  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c2))

  eqid(cmpo(hs1, hs2, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cec(co(cv(hs1), cfv(csg, c0), cv(hs2)), co(c0, cqg, c1))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

blocks.name: qustgphaus
blocks.content: The quotient of a topological group by a closed normal subgroup is a Hausdorff topological group. In particular, the quotient by the closure of the identity is a Hausdorff topological group, isomorphic to both the Kolmogorov quotient and the Hausdorff quotient operations on topological spaces (because T0 and Hausdorff coincide for topological groups). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
